pages.title: Pigment Pedestal
pages.text: The $(bold)Pigment Pedestal$() is the block where you craft most of the recipes for Spectrum.$(br2)It requires air, or an inventory above it. To start crafting, supply a redstone signal.

Most recipes require $(l:general/gemstone_powder)Gemstone Powder$() as an ingredient.$(br2)The Pedestal also acts as a normal crafting table and can therefore also be used to craft vanilla recipes.$(br2)You can use a $(l:general/crafting_tablet)Crafting Tablet$() to automate Spectrums and Vanillas recipes.
$(br)The Pigment Pedestal can be built with your gemstone of choice.$(br2)They do look different, but are the same, functionally.
